name: Melting pot.
description: The hero advances the story of love by selecting one from among three men (prince, singer, devil). Fate will change greatly depending on your choice.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7. 8. 10. Processor: Pentium3 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: no need DirectX: Version 6.1 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: no need
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7. 8. 10. Processor: Pentium3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: no need DirectX: Version 6.1 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: no need
